abstract: Janine Gibson, the paper’s editor in chief of its United States operations, will return to London and will be replaced by Katherine Viner.
snippet: Janine Gibson, the paper’s editor in chief of its United States operations, will return to London and will be replaced by Katherine Viner.
lead_paragraph: The Guardian will make broad changes among its most senior editors this year, the newspaper said Thursday, announcing that Janine Gibson, the editor in chief of its operations in the United States, will return to London.

headline.print_headline: Guardian Shuffles Its Editors in America and Overseas
